results.title: Life story
results.creator_credit: Joel Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Joel Atkinson’s parents split up, his dad took him to Shepparton. Determined to make the most of it, Atkinson worked hard to be a good role model for his siblings.

results.title: Cousins
results.creator_credit: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Helen Atkinson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Helen Atkinson believes that family should always be close so you have someone to turn to when you need them the most. She shares a close bond with her cousin and wouldn’t have it any other way.

results.title: Always thinking of home
results.creator_credit: Troy Lovett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Troy Lovett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Troy Lovett’s parents divorced, he moved to Heywood which had a great Koorie population and was a great place to grow up. Lovett has since moved to Shepparton and, while he doesn’t miss the small town itself, there is a lot he misses about it.

results.creator_credit: Patty Donaczy, Marion Beeton, Ramptha Edwards, Judith Rigney, Daniel Edwards, Anna Williams, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six stories from members of the Swan Hill Indigenous community. Parents, children and inspirational family members are celebrated in these stories, connecting the participants to their heritage.

results.title: My tribe
results.creator_credit: Judith Rigney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Judith Rigney’s family are the love of her life. At age 22, Rigney gave birth to her first child. Here she proudly and lovingly pays tribute her ‘tribe’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Judith Rigney, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
